comments.creator: sbautista@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
**Request Description** 
This bug is meant to encompass various H1 activities that I am conducting to orient myself to mobile UR with Elisabeth Klann. Activities include but are not limited to: mobile stakeholder interviews, meeting/Slack channel inventories, and Q2 roadmap planning.

**Deadline** 
Will be ongoing but aiming to have most activities completed by June 30, 2020.

**Priority Level** 
1

**Priority Level Description** 
Level 1 because my joining the mobile group is meant to alleviate some of the UR requests that Elisabeth is carrying ASAP and to develop a roadmap that can be socialized with senior leadership, particularly in regard to mobile OKRs

**Supporting Information**
All work-in-progress, with more documentation to come:
Q2 UR planning: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sNroQX_Ek0GoSyFHhSOQX0gnW2B8xPiJTbuzbIDObKs/edit
Meeting/Slack channel inventory: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qf8bFRkDMfBHjeS1kBTeOqZu8ZFqbyTzmmxmZJXsdBs/edit#gid=0
comments.author: sbautista@mozilla.com
comments.text:
**Request Description** 
This bug is meant to encompass various H1 activities that I am conducting to orient myself to mobile UR with Elisabeth Klann. Activities include but are not limited to: mobile stakeholder interviews, meeting/Slack channel inventories, and Q2 roadmap planning.

**Deadline** 
Will be ongoing but aiming to have most activities completed by June 30, 2020.

**Priority Level** 
1

**Priority Level Description** 
Level 1 because my joining the mobile group is meant to alleviate some of the UR requests that Elisabeth is carrying ASAP and to develop a roadmap that can be socialized with senior leadership, particularly in regard to mobile OKRs

**Supporting Information**
All work-in-progress, with more documentation to come:
Q2 UR planning: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sNroQX_Ek0GoSyFHhSOQX0gnW2B8xPiJTbuzbIDObKs/edit
Meeting/Slack channel inventory: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qf8bFRkDMfBHjeS1kBTeOqZu8ZFqbyTzmmxmZJXsdBs/edit#gid=0

I'm going to close this for now since the initial onboarding activities are complete:
- An inventory of mobile (Android and iOS) meetings and Slack channels and triage of meetings Elisabeth Klann and I will attend (together, separately, and/or not on a regular basis): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qf8bFRkDMfBHjeS1kBTeOqZu8ZFqbyTzmmxmZJXsdBs/edit#gid=0
- Six stakeholder interviews and summary for UR audience
- With Elisabeth Klann, draft v. 0.5 of a Mobile UR roadmap (available upon request)
- Start to mobile-related research reviews, like this one for future-of-Lockwise planning: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1EgqrTCmCMjgRaijHoKOwviY3myGbnh-NhH_VhORYWb4/edit#
